content:
Yeah, I'd encourage you to re-read the pdf, not because there's something there you missed, but because I sort of wrote it for my past self, and on this topic in particular there is immense value in reviewing something you've read before because it always goes from "I have no f'ing idea what they are saying" to "oh, I kinda get that, and this, but not that" and then slowly it all comes together. 

All that I hope to do is try to basically point people in the right direction, and if I were to provide any helpful service to where I used to be, it would just be in saying "nope, that ain't it". The communication of self-realization is about drawing a circle of knowledge around a well that says "The answer is here, between the lines. Here are a bunch of things that aren't the answer". Unfortunately the only way to communicate it at all is to basically stand in the way when someone goes the wrong direction and turn them around, you can't point directly to the realization.
